introduction.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
introduction.content: By accessing or using Falco-X services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Service
services.content: Falco-X provides a comprehensive ecosystem of services including digital asset trading, token creation, staking pools, launchpad services, trading bots, P2P marketplace, copy trading, integrated games, online store, farming, and more.

exclusivity.title: 3. Eligibility
exclusivity.content: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to accept these Terms and use Falco-X services.

acceptance.title: 4. User Responsibilities
acceptance.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their credentials and ensuring all activity through their account complies with applicable laws.

kyc.title: 5. KYC and Privacy
kyc.content: All information provided through the KYC verification process will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

trust.title: 6. Automated Services
trust.content: Bots operate according to user-defined settings. Falco-X does not guarantee returns and assumes no responsibility for automated bot decisions.

responsibility.title: 7. Risk Acknowledgment
responsibility.content: Falco-X provides financial tools that carry significant risks, including potential loss of capital. You acknowledge that you trade and participate at your own risk.

modification.title: 8. Service Modifications
modification.content: Falco-X reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the service at any time without prior notice.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Cryptocurrency trading and blockchain project participation involve significant risks, including total loss of invested capital. Falco-X is not a financial advisor.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@falcox.net.
